headNote.p: Sanger gave this speech at a farewell luncheon at the First Pennsylvania birth control conference. She also gave another speech that day titled "Birth Control: Is it moral?," which may have been a version of "Morality of Birth Control," Nov. 18, 1921, or "Morality and Birth Control," 1918. After this event she left on her trip to Japan and China.
